Error.Locked: That item is locked. Use the unlock keybind to interact with it.
Config.UnlockKeybind.Name: Lock/Unlock Keybind
Config.UnlockKeybind.Tooltip: The key to press to allow manipulating locked items
Config.ShowLockMessages.Name: Show Lock Warning
Config.ShowLockMessages.Tooltip: If enabled, show a warning message if you try to interact with a locked item.
Config.PlayLockedSound.Name: Play Locked Sound
Config.PlayLockedSound.Tooltip: If enabled, play a sound effect when trying to interact with a locked item.
Config.ToggleLock.Name: Toggle Lock/Unlock
Config.ToggleLock.Tooltip: If enabled, the keybind will toggle whether items are locked or unlocked. If unchecked, the key must be held down to manipulate locked items.
Config.LockItemSigns.Name: Lock Signs
Config.LockItemSigns.Tooltip: If enabled, item display signs will not allow the display item to be overridden without the lock/unlock keybind. If the sign is blank, you can set it normally.
Config.LockTextSigns.Name: Lock Text Signs
Config.LockTextSigns.Tooltip: If enabled, text signs will not display the edit dialog without the lock/unlock keybind. If the sign is blank, you can set it normally.
Config.LockCrabPots.Name: Lock Crab Pots
Config.LockCrabPots.Tooltip: If enabled, you will be unable to pickup crab pots without using the lock/unlock keybind.
Config.LockFloors.Name: Lock Floors
Config.LockFloors.Tooltip: If enabled, you will be unable to break floors without using the lock/unlock keybind.
Config.LockDecorations.Name: Lock Decorations
Config.LockDecorations.Tooltip: If enabled, you will be unable to pickup decorations without using the lock/unlock keybind.
Config.LockFurniture.Name: Lock Furniture
Config.LockFurniture.Tooltip: If enabled, you will be unable to pickup furniture without using the lock/unlock keybind.
Config.LockPlayerGifting.Name: Lock Player Gifting
Config.LockPlayerGifting.Tooltip: If enabled, you will be unable to gift items to other co-op players without using the lock/unlock keybind.
